short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor Web Page and Generate Feed & Notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Low Code
* If no coding skills, you can use our "Public Scripts" which will cover common sites.
* It requires HTML, CSS, Javascript to track *ANY* page with custom script.
* No need other softwares.
* No installing decpendencies.
* No server deployment.
* Coding, debugging...everything is in extension.
* Our built-in methods make scraping easier and flexiable refering to our documentation.

WYSIWYG
* In extension as long as displayed in browser, it can be tracked. No need additional complex work on:
* Cookies, 
* Proxy,
* Login state...

RSS
* The extension automatically generates RSS feed service for tracking sources. All you need is keep the tracking page open to monitor pages updates.

For more information:
https://jiant.ing/
contact@jiant.ing
